column2: 1KB lightweight, fast & powerful JavaScript templating engine with zero dependencies. Compatible with server-side environments like node.js, module loaders like RequireJS and all web browsers.

column5:
Use blueimp+jsdoc+prettier config for eslint.

Move eslint configs to package.json.
Use package.json files property instead of .npmignore.

Use standard via eslint config.
Update chai, mocha and uglifyjs.
Also include the minified version in the npm package.
Move demo script into separate folder.

Replace expect.js with chai.js.
Update mocha, standard and uglify-js.
Remove UglifyJS dependency for the compilation script. Closes #45.
Add source map for the minified JS file.
Remove obsolete jQuery dependency from the demo.
Copy vendor dependencies into project source.
Keep the gh-pages branch in sync with master.
Better support Node.js style module loaders.
Reformat documentation to fit into 80 characters column.

Update development dependencies.
Remove obsolete bug tracking link.

Fix JSHint compatibility (consistent quotes, missing "use strict" statement).
Also remove obsolete version numbers from individual files.
Add license field to package definition(s).
Use the https version of the test resources.
Updated test file version for last merge.

Revert "use .to.eql() instead of .to.be()"

This reverts commit 579867916dcb4a3c8a6c7a7faa9945f3286a0ccd.

Merge pull request #40 from steelywing/patch-1

fix test
Added PhantomJS check to test runner HTML page.
Added mocha grunt tasks for both server- (NodeJS) and client-side (PhantomJS) tests.
Print out falsy values except undefined and null. Closes #35
Removed scripts and bin section from bower.json. Closes #32
Allow the modulo operator in evaluation context. Closes #30

Added documentation on how to run the Unit Tests.

Remvoed the unnecessary jQuery dependency from the test HTML page.

Refactored demo implementation.

Added bower.json.
Updated Makefile and compile.js for UglifyJS2.
Added X-UA-Compatible meta tag to force latest IE rendering engine or ChromeFrame if installed.

Strings matched by the encoding regular expression, but not found in the encoding map are now removed from the output.

Added single quotes to the default characters to encode: ' => '
This allows safely using single quotes for attributes in HTML
documents, e.g. for embedding JSON, which requires double quotes for
its own properties and string values.
Use a .gitignore file instead of the files field in package.json.

Use [\s\S] instead of the dot to match any character.

This allows to override the replacement function to preserve whitespace.
Include colon and dot as valid characters in script section ids.
Use the file basename as id for pure template files.
Rebuilt minified version, which had been overwritten with statically compiled templates.

Added functionality to create statically compiled templates.

Updated Templates library to use a wrapper function instead of
arguments.callee to reference the tmpl object.
Use "text/x-tmpl" instead of "text/html" as type for the template script sections.

Moved node-qunit into it's own module package.
Added Makefile to create the minified version.
Updated Bootstrap version.
Moved Bootstrap IE6 fixes into a separate file.
Updated license link and package information.
Print falsy values as empty strings.

Use {%#o.prop%} instead of {%!o.prop%} to print unescaped strings, to avoid confusion with negated variables.
Remove empty string concatenations from the generated template function body.
